lead_paragraph: HERZOG--Diana E. The Board of Directors and Staff of INCLUDEnyc (formerly Resources for Children with Special Needs) mourn our former board chair, board member, and long- time supporter. Diana's commitment, warmth, passion, and friendship will be deeply missed. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HERZOG, DIANA E

snippet: HERZOG--Diana E. The Board of Directors and Staff of INCLUDEnyc (formerly Resources for Children with Special Needs) mourn our former board chair, board member, and long- time supporter. Diana's commitment, warmth, passion, and friendship will be deeply missed. 1/3
